column3: THE FIGURES IN THIS TABLE ARE NOT NATIONAL STATISTICS

column2: RPI all items excluding mortgage interest payments (RPIX): 1976 to 2018 1
Key:     -  zero or negligible    ..  Not available
The Retail Prices Index and its derivatives do not meet the required standards
for designation as National Statistics. A full report can be found at:
To revalue a sum of money between two periods in time
adjusting to the RPIX use the following formula:
Sum of money times (later date index divided by earlier date index)
To calculate a percentage change between any two months
adjusting to the RPIX use the following formula:
(later date index minus earlier date index divided by earlier date index)
